com.topcoder.util.format
Class ObjectFormatterFactory

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.util.format.ObjectFormatterFactory
public class ObjectFormatterFactory
extends java.lang.Object

A factory class for creating ObjectFormatters.

Version:
1.0
Author:
KurtSteinkraus, garyk

Method Summary
static ObjectFormatter getEmptyFormatter()
          Returns an empty formatter, which will not be able to format any object without being supplied with the appropriate ObjectFormatMethod.
static ObjectFormatter getPlainFormatter()
          Returns a formatter that converts an object into a formatted string by calling the object's toString method.
static ObjectFormatter getPrettyFormatter()
          Returns a formatter that converts an object into a prettified formatted string.
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getEmptyFormatter

public static ObjectFormatter getEmptyFormatter()
Returns an empty formatter, which will not be able to format any object without being supplied with the appropriate ObjectFormatMethod.

Returns:
the empty formatter

getPlainFormatter

public static ObjectFormatter getPlainFormatter()
Returns a formatter that converts an object into a formatted string by calling the object's toString method. This formatter associates Objects with the format method returned by FormatMethodFactory.getDefaultObjectFormatMethod.

Returns:
the plain formatter

getPrettyFormatter

public static ObjectFormatter getPrettyFormatter()
Returns a formatter that converts an object into a prettified formatted string. This formatter returns the Object equivalent of PrimitiveFormatterFactory.getPrettyFormatter(). It creates an association for each primitive type's wrapper class. It also creates an association for Dates, using the format method returned by FormatMethodFactory.getDefaultDateFormatMethod(java.lang.String) when using the default formatting string.

Returns:
the pretty formatter
